About Text:
Abhishek is currently working at Reliance Nippon Life Insurance Company as a Chief Manager. He is a part of the CEO's Office and Strategy Team.

He completed his Post Graduate Diploma in Finance from S.P Jain Institute of Management and Research (SPJIMR), Mumbai.

He is a Qualified Company Secretary and is pursuing Chartered Accountancy (Group 2 Finals). He did his graduation in B.Com (Honours) from St. Xavier's College, Kolkata and his schooling from Don Bosco School, Liluah.

Being a sports enthusiast, he has won district level Badminton Tournaments and was also a part of his college Table Tennis team.
